TextBlock.Text: FUCHSIA: Hello? Agapanthus? Ixora? Are you guys okay?
GAILLARDIA: Did you not see the threatening transmission from their vessel? An alien species seemed to have murdered them!
FUCHSIA: Oh dear. In that case, put that solar neighborhood into a no-warp zone. First Escall, now Agapanthus! We must not risk losing any more Nomai!
GAILLARDIA: Does this mean we stop looking for Escall?
FUCHSIA: Of course it does! Escall's Clan might as well be dead too!
